summary: Build a professional, mobile-friendly 3-page website for Jain Orthopaedic and Diagnostic Centre (English + Hindi) with specified branding, sections, and integrations (WhatsApp, Call Now, Google Maps), plus SEO and SSL considerations.
architectural_notes: Site structure: 3 pages (Home, About/Doctor Profile, Services & Contact) with max 5–6 sections per page
Responsive/mobile-first design with prominent 'Call Now' and WhatsApp appointment CTAs
Branding: white background, soft blue #4A90E2 headers, green #7ED321 accent buttons; rounded buttons with hover effects
Typography: Montserrat Bold for headings; Lato Regular for body text
Include Google Maps embed for clinic location and social proof (4.7 rating, 390 reviews)
SEO-friendly heading structure and SSL/HTTPS integration requirement
Asset constraint: use only the two provided photos (no additional images)

Design refinement pass requested: enhance visual appeal via improved spacing/layout, typography hierarchy, card/section styling, and subtle animations—without changing site structure or adding new image assets.
known_issues: Duplicate WhatsApp icon appears twice on the site (should be single WhatsApp CTA/icon).
"Get Directions" button label/text is not centered; needs centered font alignment.
Deployment/build is failing during deployment (error details not provided yet); needs build/deployment logs to diagnose and fix.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive 3-page marketing website for "Jain Orthopaedic and Diagnostic Centre" with clear top navigation linking to Home, About/Doctors, and Services & Contact, keeping each page to a maximum of 5–6 sections.

Apply the provided brand/design system consistently: white background, soft blue (#4A90E2) for headers/primary highlights, green (#7ED321) for accent buttons; headings use Montserrat (bold) and body text uses Lato (regular); CTAs use rounded corners with hover animations.

Use only the two user-uploaded photos (image.png and image-1.png) as photographic content on the website; do not introduce any additional photos/stock images. If icons are needed, use inline SVG icons (not image files).

Implement the Home page sections with the provided clinic details: (1) Hero featuring one of the provided photos, headline with clinic name and a short welcome mentioning Dr. S.K. Jain & Dr. Prerna Jain; (2) Social proof block highlighting Google rating 4.7/5 and 390 reviews plus 2–3 testimonial snippets; (3) Quick services overview with icons for Orthopedic care, Bone & joint treatment, Diagnostics (and optionally physiotherapy guidance); (4) Prominent WhatsApp appointment CTA; (5) Embedded Google Map for the clinic address; (6) "Call Now" CTA optimized for mobile.

Implement the About/Doctor Profile page containing: doctor profiles for Dr. S.K. Jain and Dr. Prerna Jain (qualifications/experience/specialization fields present even if content is concise), clinic story/mission, highlights for hygiene/staff professionalism/positive atmosphere, and the provided patient review highlights. Optionally include a small gallery section using only the two provided photos.

Implement the Services & Contact page with: a detailed services list (Orthopedic consultation, bone & joint treatment, minor diagnostics, physiotherapy guidance), an appointment widget (simple form or button) that enables WhatsApp booking, full contact details (phone/WhatsApp), working hours (10 AM–7 PM Monday–Saturday; closed Sunday), address, and an embedded Google Map. Optionally include an FAQ section for common patient questions.

Add bilingual support (English + Hindi) for key clinic identity elements: display the Hindi clinic name "जैन ऑर्थोपेडिक एंड डायग्नोस्टिक सेंटर दर स.के. जैन, दर प्रेरणा जैन" alongside the English clinic name and provide a simple language toggle (EN/हिं) that swaps core labels/headings and CTAs where feasible.

Implement site-wide CTAs and footer: persistent WhatsApp button, clear "Call" and "Get Directions" actions, and a footer that includes clinic address, phone number, WhatsApp button, and a link to open the map location in a new tab.

Add basic SEO-friendly structure: unique page titles and meta descriptions per page, semantic headings (one H1 per page), and on-page social proof (4.7-star rating and 390 reviews) displayed at least on Home (and optionally repeated elsewhere).
Ensure accessibility and mobile usability: appropriate color contrast, keyboard focus states for interactive elements, tap-friendly button sizes, and responsive layout for common breakpoints.

Add a coherent, modern visual theme consistent with the clinic domain (calm, clinical, trustworthy) using the provided color palette and typography, including consistent spacing, section dividers, and card styles; avoid adding new product features beyond the requested sections.

Improve the overall visual polish across all three pages (Home, About/Doctors, Services & Contact) by refining spacing, alignment, typographic hierarchy, and section composition while keeping the existing content and structure intact.
Enhance the header/navigation styling to feel more premium and modern (e.g., improved active state, hover states, spacing, and subtle depth) without changing navigation behavior or adding new routes.

Refine card, button, and CTA styling to look more cohesive and high-quality (consistent corner radii, shadows, borders, hover/focus micro-interactions), while staying within the existing brand palette and typography.

Upgrade section backgrounds and transitions for a more attractive look (e.g., subtle gradients, dividers, or decorative shapes/patterns implemented via CSS/SVG) without introducing any new photographic assets.
Polish the footer and floating WhatsApp button presentation to better match the refreshed design (spacing, typography, hover/focus states), keeping the same actions and links.
Remove the duplicate WhatsApp icon from the Footer "Quick Actions" WhatsApp button so that only a single WhatsApp icon is displayed next to the label.
Center the content (icon + text) within the "Get Directions" button so that the label is visually centered horizontally inside the full-width button, including in the Footer "Quick Actions" section.
Remove the duplicate WhatsApp icon in the Footer "Quick Actions" WhatsApp button so only a single WhatsApp icon is rendered next to the label.
Ensure the Footer "Quick Actions" "Get Directions" button content (icon + text) is horizontally centered within the full-width button at all screen sizes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a clean, modern, responsive 3-page orthopedic clinic website (Home, About/Doctors, Services & Contact) using provided clinic content, bilingual support, WhatsApp/Call buttons, Google Map embed, social proof, SEO-friendly headings, and SSL/HTTPS guidance; use only the two provided photos.

Refine the site’s visual design to be more attractive (improve layout, spacing, typography hierarchy, section styling, and tasteful micro-interactions) while staying within the existing brand palette, 3-page structure, and the constraint of using only the two provided photos.
